snippet: The wife of former Representative Jesse Jackson Jr. went to prison Tuesday to serve time for convictions tied to $750,000 in lavish illegal spending of campaign money.
abstract: Sandi Jackson, wife of former Representative Jesse Jackson Jr and  former Chicago city councilwoman, begins one year sentence in Federal Prison Camp at Alderson, West Virginia for falsified information on her income tax returns.
lead_paragraph: The wife of former Representative Jesse Jackson Jr. went to prison Tuesday to serve time for convictions tied to $750,000 in lavish illegal spending of campaign money.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Wife of Jesse Jackson Jr. Begins Prison Term
headline.main: Illinois: Wife of Jesse Jackson Jr. Begins Prison Term
